titles: A vindication of Scripture and ministery in a rejoynder to a reply not long since published by Thomas Speed ... : wherein sundry Scriptures are explained, divers questions (relating to these times) discussed, and the truth asserted against the exceptions of papists and Quakers : whereunto is adjoyned a postscript reflecting upon and returning answer to divers passages in Thomas Speed his last pamphlet / by William Thomas ...
author: Thomas, William, 1593-1667.
notes: A reply to Thomas Speed's "The guilty-covered clergy-man unvailed."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
keywords: Speed, Thomas, b. 1622 or 3. --  Guilty-covered clergy-man unvailed.
